comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Foxfire 4.0 is horrible. It stutters, stammers, seizes, freezes, fails to respond and refuses to load about every other page I try to visit.
 BUT WORST of all ..it lags on keystrokes, sometimes falling behind by 4 or 5 strokes.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.type
2.
3.
Actual Results:  
falls behind by 4 or 5 keystrokes

Expected Results:  
I expect it to keep up with my slow typing

comments.text:
Works fine for me. Please try if you can reproduce it or if it works fine

1.in safe mode. 
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Safe+Mode

2.or by creating a new profile
https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Managing+profiles#Creating_a_profile
